summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding travel arrangements for a witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The witness will testify under a pseudonym, and a travel request form is attached.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working on the Maxwell case, is requesting assistance with travel arrangements for a witness who will testify under a pseudonym.

events.title: Witness Travel Request Email
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a travel request form for a witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email from a prosecutor in the Southern District of New York regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
It concerns travel arrangements for a witness who will testify under a pseudonym.
The email indicates ongoing trial preparation activities as of November 2021.
